lead_paragraph: Alex Smith got a vote of confidence from San Francisco. The 49ers exercised a multimillion-dollar buyback clause in Smith’s contract that essentially extends his deal through 2010. General Manager Scot McCloughan said the overall deal was similar to one made last season by the Giants, who bought back two voidable years in Eli Manning’s contract for a reported $5 million.
